doc.title: Experiment Extreme
doc.plot: A stormy day in Pawvale city. The weather is a messenger of unexpected crisis for the house-mates, Lark and Huey, unaware of what is to come. Amongst the disturbing sound of storm and thunder, an ominous knock at the door. An unusual, outlandish stranger arrives. A stranger, who will awaken long forgotten memories, and becoming a joy for one house-mate, while a nightmare for the other.
